item.title: How To Deploy Your Node-React-Mongo App To Amazon Web Service
item.author: xiaoyun@looseleafapp.com (Xiaoyun Yang)
item.description: In this tutorial, I will provide a step-by-step guide for how to containerize your Mongo/Express/React/Node (MERN) app with Docker and deploy it to Amazon Web Service (AWS) Elastic Container Service (ECS). I will share my research and lessons learned deploying a MERN app, including what worked, what didn’t work, how I prepared the app for deployment and accomplished the deployment.
